news.title: Foundry Virtual Tabletop's 4th Anniversary Celebration!
news.caption: Our week-long anniversary celebration has begun! We have a lot of fun activities and announcements planned along with sales on our content as well as great deals from our publishing partners. Check out our schedule of events to join in!

news.title: Version 12 Stable Release
news.caption: Version 12 Stable has now been released! Check out our release notes for everything you need to know.

news.title: Special Announcement: Ember
news.caption: Ember is a roleplaying campaign and setting with groundbreaking digital features from the creators of Foundry Virtual Tabletop. Check out our teaser page and sign up to get alerted when the Kickstarter goes live!

news.title: Dungeons & Dragons Arrives on Foundry Virtual Tabletop
news.caption: We are thrilled to share that Foundry Virtual Tabletop is now partnered with Wizards of the Coast to bring official content for Dungeons & Dragons to Foundry VTT!

news.title: V12 Development Update Q&A
news.caption: Catch up with Atropos, Kim, Ludovic, and Eber as they walk through the changes in V12 Prototype 1 and answer audience questions!

featuredContent.title: Tasha's Cauldron of Everything is Available Now
featuredContent.caption: It includes the artificer, 26 new subclasses, new dynamic tokens, sidekicks, puzzles, an expanded DMâ€™s toolkit and much more, all directly integrated in Foundry VTT.
